main event: A USAF facility (Bradley Field) observed an unidentified fast-moving target approaching an aircraft near Pittsfield, Massachusetts on a flight to Stanford, Connecticut.
interesting points: The unidentified target was detected on radar and observed visually by the aircraft crew.
The target closed to within about 3 miles of the aircraft before pulling away.
The target had white and flashing green lights, and appeared brilliant and several times brighter than stars.
The altitude of the target was unknown.
The Project Blue Book officer was unable to obtain further information from the USAF facility that observed the incident.
sighted object: A fast-moving target with white and flashing green lights, appearing brilliant and several times brighter than stars
location: Near Pittsfield, Massachusetts, on a flight to Stanford, Connecticut
